1.content: Glad that you decided to consider this story to look at! Ok, let's get this story started then. First, are we going for a male or female character to follow?
1.title: Getting Started

11.content: All righty then, going with a feminine approach. Who should we follow then?
11.title: Female

111.content:
"Hermione. Hermione?... HERMIONE!!!"
"Gah! What?"
Harry and Ron looked at their friend who dozed off after their potions class. Classes were getting increasingly harder and Hermione wanted to make sure that she finished all her work. But in order to do that, she skipped out on most of her meals, only grabbing a biscuit to eat every once and a while, and spent most of her nights studying and writing. Now, she was a wreck in between classes. She paid attention during classes, like she normally did, but when they were over, Hermione would fall fast asleep. Ron and Harry found it harder and harder to wake her up each time she blacked out. It took them ten minutes to wake her up this time. Luckily, there wasn't any class for several hours.
Hermione shook off the sleep and said, "Thanks guys. It has been difficult staying awake lately."
Ron sarcastically replied, "Nah, all that food and sleep you're getting must surely be helping Hermione."
She was about to snap back at him until she realized that he was right. Sluggishly, Hermione drifted off and went to the dining hall to get something to fuel herself.
"Blimey Harry, she looks like a car wreck."
"I know Ron. Hopefully she can get things back on track soon."

Hermione grabbed a bunch of food and started to eat. Ginny stopped by and looked a little shocked to see her friend scarfing down her meal.
"Well, hello there brother. I didn't know that you turned into a girl."
Hermione barely looked up at her and muffled through the food, "Not funny Ginny. I haven't had any food for several days and I am trying to make up for it."
"Slow down there Hermione! Eating too much like that isn't healthy for you. Your stomach might burst from cramming all that food down like that."
With a big gulp, she sighed and said, "Well what would you recommend? I can't stay awake lately and I need the fuel."
Ginny thought for a moment. "Hmm... Ease into the eating. That might help. And get some sleep too. I can see wrinkles on those wrinkles under your eyes." She showed Hermione a mirror and she looked like a mess.
"Ahhh!! Look at me!"
Ginny glanced down and giggled a little bit. "Yeah, look at your stomach. Looks like you're...."
Hermione looked down and her stomach was bulging from the food. Terrified, she darted out of the hall and into the bathroom. Ginny sighed and went after her.

Luna was washing her hands when Hermione went sprinting in and collided into her. Dazed, Luna got up and gained her bearings.
"Ow... oh, hello Hermione. I didn't expect you to run into me today."
Hermione, a little hysterical, pointed to her stomach and shrieked, "Look at my belly! It looks like I'm fat beyond belief!" She began shaking her head, stuttering, "What am I going to do?? What am I going to do??"
Luna grabbed her shoulders and calmed her down, "Hermione, settle down. You don't need to get worked up like this. Here..."
Luna reached for her bag and got a book.
"Take this. It's a book full of spells, charms, and hexes that alter people's appearance and body functions. Some only work for an extended time, while some work until you cast the counter charm to cancel it."
Hermione stared at the book in wonder and smiled greatly. "Thanks Luna!"
She dashed out of the bathroom and went off to her dorm. Ginny had only managed to get there only when Hermione left.
"*pant* Hey Luna. Have you seen Hermione?"
Luna picked up her bag and answered, "Yeah, she was here a minute ago. I gave her a book and she dashed off with it in anticipation."
Ginny sighed. "Thanks Luna. I think I will check the Gryffindor house then."

Hermione eagerly opened the book and flipped through it, looking for a spell to increase her metabolism. "... Ah! Here it is!"
She immediately cast the spell and looked down. Her stomach shook about a bit and reduced in size in seconds.
"Success!.... Hey, what's this one? The... Vorium Gorgeous Charm, otherwise known as 'Vorius'? Let's see... cast this on yourself and you will be able to devour anything you wish. Your body becomes elastic, thus letting you swallow anything whole. Be warned: This charm is very dangerous. If you wish to not digest anything, you must cast the Protectous Digestous charm in conjunction with the Vorius charm. Hmm... this will let me eat as much as I want and get all the energy I need for my classes! Excellent."
She looked at an extra footnote at the bottom of the page. "Warning: Casting this charm may cause increased appetites with each use. Multiple uses of this charm will make the user even more hungry each time, causing you to eat objects, and even people, that would not be possible to swallow whole before. Too many uses may cause the user to become uncontrollable to the point you need others to return you to normal."
"This seems to be a risky charm. Is it worth the risk?" She looked at her stomach and growled. "Maybe this one time." She cast the Vorium charm and looked at her stomach again.
"Huh. Nothing feels different..."
Behind her, heard someone coming into the common room where she decided to read the book. It was...
111.title: Start of a new charm...

1111.content:
"Hermione! Are you here? I just want to make sure that your were- hey! Your stomach is back to normal. How did that happen? Exercise?"
Hermione closed the book and turned around to find Ginny. "Yeah, it's back to normal. I found a charm that can make my metabolism faster. Now I can eat anything I want and look normal while getting the energy I need."
A growl came out of nowhere. Ginny, confused, asked, "Where did that come from?"
Hermione rubbed her stomach and giggled, "I guess I'm still hungry. But it feels, much stronger now."
Her stomach grumbled and rumbled. "Geez Hermione. Your stomach is really speaking huh? Want to grab some food?"
Starving, Hermione got up with the book. She was about to say something when she paused.

A vision came to her. A darker form of herself appeared to her. The darker version looked at Hermione and raised her hand out to her, beckoning her to come forward.
It said, "You summoned me and here I am. I give you the power to eat anything you desire. But, in return, you are under my control. You are mine." The figure drifted towards her grabbed her and...

"Hermione! You there?"
Ginny shouted at Hermione. She snapped out of it and looked at Ginny. "... oh, it's nothing. I just had a... vision. A strange one..."
"I bet it was nothing."
Hermione added, "But it seemed so real." She whispered to herself, "Who was that girl? Was that me?"
Her stomach gave another loud growl. "Hermione! Tell that stomach of yours to be quiet! We'll get you food soon."

A voice said, "Go ahead Hermione. Eat. Ginny will provide you well. She will be delicious...."
Hermione looked around frantically. "Where did that voice come from?"
She noticed Ginny and drool crept out of her mouth. Hermione wiped it off her mouth and jumped back. "Eat her. Come on. You can't go ignore me."
"What should I do?"
1111.title: A battle within her mind... and stomach

choices: Realise your mistakes and let her our
11111.content: Hermione licked her lips in anticipation of what was to happen next Ginny questioned her” wha-what are you doing she mustered before hermoine with eyes of hunger held her tight, you’ll taste Devine she said before bringing Ginny up to her lips to be devoured whole inside hermoines stomach
11111.title: Eat her

111111.content:
Hermione jammed Ginny's head into her salivating maw, moaning at the taste. Quickly, she gulped, bringing in Ginny's slender shoulders, which she devoured with gusto. Hermione gently nibbled on Ginny's small, but curvy breasts, before moving away from them.
Ginny's stomach proved no resistance, and Hermione soon slurped up Ginny's legs. Inside the other Gryffindor's stomach, the redheaded girl found no solace as her clothes were quickly and brutally digested. It seemed her fate was to slowly digest, and become a part of Hermione Granger.
She screamed as she digested, her body becoming a soup of nutrition for Hermione, who admired herself in the mirror the following morning.
"Bigger boobs, bigger ass-darn Ginny, you added to me fine!" She remarked to herself. Hermione smiled, and walked out the door-her Ginny-enhanced body swaying all the way.
111111.title: Let funny digest

11112.content:
"Eat her! Do it! I command you!" The voice violently said to Hermione. In turn, Hermione shouted, "No! Stop shouting at me!"
Ginny turned around, not sure what Hermione was going on about. "Um, Hermione, I'm not shouting at you. Care to explain?"
Hermione, now realizing that the voice went away, stood there perplexed. ".... There was a strange voice in my head... it wanted me to... to eat you..."
Ginny, eyes wide, stood there speechless. ".... Hermione, you sure that that charm you mentioned worked right?"
"The book!" She flipped through the book and found the counter spell. The voice viciously hissed, "Don't you dare use that charm! I will haunt you when you sleep!"
Hermione, taut by the battle in her head, screamed, "Get out of my head!!"
She cast the counter charm and the voice was silenced for good. Looking at the page, she ripped it out of the book and tore it up, destroying it for good.
"What was that about, Hermione?"
She looked at Ginny and sighed, "A charm that I should just forget..."
The two girls walked out of the common room and went to lunch, trying to ignore what had happened.

Ginny thought to herself, "Sounds like the Vorius charm..." She grinned evilly at Hermione. "It should remain as it is: her not knowing more of that charm..."

The... End??
11112.title: Not Today!

1113.content:
It was Lavender, and Hermione's stomach growled loudly. She smiled-tonight, Hogwarts would have a missing student. Tonight, Lavender disappeared into her body.
Later on, Hermione approached her prey's bed, and gently engulfed the sleeping Lavender's head. It was only a matter of time, Hermione thought as Lavender's neck disappeared into her maw.
1113.title: Lavender

11533.title: MORE

choices: Susan eats you in her room
115331.content:
Susan Bones happened to be your best friend, apart from Hermione Granger and Luna Lovegood. You were, like Susan, a Hufflepuff. One day, that all changed when Susan discovered a long-lost charm in one of her aunt's forgotten books over the summer. A charm that had the power to hide an entire group of people within one person.
It had been nicknamed the Ediba Charm by both Light and Dark magicals of old.
(A few days before Hogwarts began its semester for the year)
"I'm bored," Susan groaned. "Why can't school start earlier?" Despite her own reassurances that Hogwarts would be fairly quiet this year, she deftly stood up, walking to the manor's library.
Since her aunt, Amelia Bones, worked long hours at the ministry and normally asked Susan not to poke around in her study, and that if she did so, the next day when Amelia was at work Susan wouldn'tbe allowed to walk around nude like she normally did if she didn't poke around.
"Oh? What's this?" You teased.
"Nothing (Y/n)," she muttered. Susan walked out of the room, letting you see her (admittedly) decently large butt. Once she was at the library, she gently looked around in, what appeared to be, a long forgotten corner of the fairly giant library, and she spotted a lone book laying on a chair. Susan walked over, opening the book.
"Warrior's battlecry, Ediba Charm...what's the Ediba Charm?" She asked herself. Looking around carefully, she sat down in the chair. "The Ediba Charm is most commonly known as the Voracious Charm, since using it causes people to gain an unnatural hunger, one that cannot be stopped unless the user ends the charm...people can be eaten by the user any way they please...anti-digestion charms are highly recommended if you decide to use it..." Susan blushed. She had a new charm to try out on you...
115331.title: Susan Bones

1153311.content: Susan breathed in and out, inadvertently breaking the meagre control the spell already had over her. The time wasn't to last, as the next day you were heading to Hogwarts. A day later, you and Susan were at Hogwarts. Susan licked her lips eagerly, imagining you curled up in her belly, or in her breasts, fighting to escape her womb...she made up her mind, and went to find you.

Hungry you try to go for it then Susan grabs you. “No no no cheeky boy” she plops you on her plate you feel warmth than you realise, your laying down on sausages. “I’m going to enjoy this” Susan says “The boy who lived, eaten by me.” She grabs ketchup and spurts in your face. You see nothing but red then you are picked up smelling her breath feeling her tongue licking you plopping you into her mouth then closing it shut.

1153311122.content:
Susan mentally sighed as she tipped her head back, sending you into the dark abyss of her belly. "Much better," she sighed as she felt you-like her, a fellow female-arrive in her grumbling stomach.
It heedlessly gurgled around you, and you woke up to your prison-temporary or permanent-shaking awfully.

"Susan?" You called, stumbling as you tried to get up. "What's happening? Where am I?"

Susan sighed as you finally settled in bed. It had been a long two days-especially for her. She sighed again as she felt a familiar itch-the one only the Ediba Charm could give her. The redhead smiled, and undressed, revealing her busty body, which was in all the right places for you (even though you were also a female) to ogle at. Perhaps in her womb? Or in her ass?

123111.content: Neville was sitting in his room on a Saturday, sunny day. He decided to take off his shirt as it was quite hot. He waved his wand as a little bit of water was pouring out from it's tip, falling right into the pot with a flower in it. He smiled as he was so focused on the beautiful plant, he didn't noticed that some came in, sneaking up behing him.
123111.title: A fellow roommate!

choices: ...Keep you here for a while until dinner.
12311121.content:
The ginger boy's stomach growled hungrily, but before Neville could turn around Ron wrapped his arms around him, licking his lips.
"Ron? What are you- No! WAIT!" Nevile stared at him, confused befire the taller boy opened his mouth, wrapping his lips around his neck as he shoved his head into his mouth. As Neville was squirming, trying to break free from his strong grasp, his wand fell out of his hand.
Ron just grinned as he reached his shoulders and arms, gulping down his friend, soon reaching his chest and chubby belly. He tasted him carefully, sucking on his soft, vanilla-flavoured skin. He used all his strength to lift him up from the ground and use the help of gravity to pull his legs into his stomach, slurping them down with ease. Neville was delicious... but heavy. Ron immediately after that, collapsed onto his bed, burping as he patted his squrming gut, feeling stuffed to the brim.
"Sorry Neville... I've always been a glutton..." Ron chuckled, patting his stomach happily.
"Ron! Please! Let me out! Why did you do this?" Neville asked, squirming desperately.
"Well... Mainly because I was hungry and I don't have time to wait 3 hours for the dinner..." He admitted honestly.
"W-What ate you going to do with me now?" Neville asked unsure.
Ron grinned, rubbing his round stomach. "I'm going to..."
12311121.title: Ron!

info.brief_description: A trip into Hogwarts.  But with a twist: a twist of vore!
info.description:
This is a trip. A journey into the world of Harry Potter. But, this is a new entry. An unique twist. A new spin-off if you will.
WARNING!! This interactive has vore, the act of swallowing and eating others whole. If you find this disturbing, do not read or enter any further. This is your only warning.
Choice who you want to follow in this new plot for Harry Potter. Harry himself, Hermione, Ron, Ginny, Luna, Snape, Malfoy, and many others. Enter this way if you choose so...
Harry Potter and all characters are owned by J.K. Rowling.
